Octociz is just about ready to fire his blasters at Liono Prime, when 
Zardus' words fly out that a truce has been called. Octociz lowers 
his guns.

"Few! Glad I didn't have to do that. Liono Prime is alot stronger 
than me. Hopefully he'll stand down too."

Octociz is just about to settle down when he decided he should go 
check if Megatron is still inside the Ark.
